categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Shehn was a Human male ordnance officer in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire who was stationed in the city of Sobrik on the planet Balmorra during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic.

Ordnance Officer Shehn appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Weapons Vendors for Imperial players on Balmorra. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, he was removed from the game.
